insert into organization_info (name, address_province, address_city, address_district, address_street, address, zip_code, founding_date, volunteer_number, principal_name, principal_telephone, principal_telephone_public, avatar) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{volunteerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalTelephonePublic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update organization_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_province = #{addressProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_city = #{addressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_district = #{addressDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_street = #{addressStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, founding_date = #{foundingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, volunteer_number = #{volunteerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, principal_name = #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_telephone = #{principalTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal_telephone_public = #{principalTelephonePublic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, address_province, address_city, address_district, address_street, address, zip_code, founding_date, volunteer_number, principal_name, principal_telephone, principal_telephone_public, avatar from organization_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
